    src code

    class SpahQL.Token.Base

    Description

    A simple superclass for all tokens - queries, filters, comparison operators, sets, literals etc. that are encountered during the parsing process

    Subclasses

    SpahQL.Token.PathComponent, SpahQL.Token.SelectionQuery, SpahQL.Token.Set, SpahQL.Token.Simple

    Class methods

    • parseAt
